welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Geertruidenberg, a charming Dutch city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore our quaint streets and immerse yourself in our unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages to various destinations around the world.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
